dc:title: The Servile State
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Inveighs against social security legislation in Britain and America noting that Hillaire Belloc prophesized it in his 1912 book The Servile State. Proposes a Catholic solution based on distributism, ownership, and "the little way." Recalls Belloc's visit to the Catholic Worker.
